p: Proteins of interest among the 13 identified differentially expressed proteins were selected for quantitative protein detection. The levels of ACY-3 and ETHE1 in the kidney tissues of MT−/− and MT+/+ mice both decreased after DU injection, and the reduction in MT−/− mice was even more significant ( Fig. 3a,b and c). These results were consistent with the results of 2-DE. The relevant findings for SOD have been confirmed in previous study 15, and the SOD levels in MT−/− mice significantly decreased compared to those in MT+/+ mice after DU exposure.
